tool_input.command: find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -exec ls -l {} + 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $5, $NF}' | sort -n | tail -1

safety_event.detail: cmd='find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -exec ls -l {} + 2>/dev/null | awk \'{print $5, $NF}\' | sort -n | tail -1' first='find'

safety_events.detail: cmd='find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -exec ls -l {} + 2>/dev/null | awk \'{print $5, $NF}\' | sort -n | tail -1' first='find'
